name: Hyperburner (itch)
description:
Hyperburner is that moment in a SciFi film where an escaping ship, travelling entirely too fast, has to navigate an insane exit.

Push your reflexes and skill as far as they'll go as the speed continues to increase, across a range of environments with their own unique dangers.

Gameplay:

  • Fluid steering controls, instant respawns, pure piloting skills
  • 30 stages to clear, then begin the true tests at higher speeds in Endless Mode
  • 6 visually different zones with their own distinct structures to navigate
  • 20 achievements to complete
  • Original soundtrack

For a list of supported controllers, see:
http://guavaman.com/projects/rewired/docs/SupportedControllers.html

-- Currently free to try on iOS (April 13 - 20) --
